title: Dating over 50: It's OK to be nervous, but don't let that stop you
description:
Contemplating dating when you're 50 or older can feel daunting. But in order to find love, you usually have to date.

In this episode, relationship experts give their best tips for figuring out what you want in a new relationship and getting back out into the dating scene.

itunes:summary: Contemplating dating when you're 50 or older can feel daunting. These tips from relationship experts can help you figure out what you're looking for before you get back out there.
